result.title: Monthly training #4 â€” String Fever
result.content:
Hello everyone! We're back on our Road to World Finals!

A new monthly training starts in a few minutes. This time we'll focus on strings and problems with notions of strings (hashing, for instance).

I prepared 20 problems for you. They are not strictly in difficulty order, but the first problems are definitely easier than the last ones. I grouped them in categories: ad hoc/parsing, dp, suffix arrays, hashing, hard problems.

Link to the contest: Problems & Scoreboard

We've got 30 days to solve them all.

Happy coding !

P.S: I've already solved all problems from UVA, so if you've got some troubles with them, don't hesitate to post a comment or/and message me.

--- Useful links to solve foregoing problems:

Tutorial about hashing: http://threads-iiith.quora.com/String-Hashing-for-competitive-programming

(If you have any, please share them with us)
